stdout.text: Step 1: Getting login page to establish session...

steps.title: Ensure product type is "FxExchange"
Ensure application tracks LV system origin
Ensure order direction is set to "AmountToSellWasProvided"
Ensure application state is "New"
Ensure application confirmation status is "False"
Ensure form is in new entry mode
Ensure checkbox has hidden false value for form binding

specs.title: Validate backend-required fields for Forex application

stdout.text: ‚úÖ Date comparison contract verified: Input.ValidityPeriod <= Date
Error message: "Validity period of purchase must be greater or equal than Date"

steps.title: Ensure account owner is required
Ensure application number is required with max 6 characters
Ensure application date is required
Ensure authorized person is required with max 35 characters
Ensure contact phone is required with max 50 characters
Ensure settlement type is required
Ensure currency sale delivery date is required
Ensure debit account is selected
Ensure credit account is selected
Ensure fee account is selected
Ensure validity period is >= application date

steps.title: Ensure application number accepts Cyrillic, Latin, digits, and special characters
Ensure details field accepts max 600 characters with extended charset
Ensure contract remark accepts max 250 characters with Cyrillic
Ensure authorized person accepts Cyrillic, Latin, and special characters

specs.title: Validate backend-conditional validation rules for Forex application

stdout.text: ‚úÖ Date comparison contract verified: Input.Date >= ValidityPeriod
Error message: "Date must be equal or lesser than Validity period of purchase"
‚úÖ Date comparison contract verified: Input.ValidityPeriod <= Date
Error message: "Validity period of purchase must be greater or equal than Date"

steps.title: Ensure amount to buy is required if amount to sell is empty
Ensure amount to sell is required if amount to buy is empty
Ensure exchange rate is required when "DefinedByTheClient"
Ensure purchase delivery date is required for "TOM" or "SPOT"
Ensure application date is <= validity period
Ensure validity period is >= application date

specs.title: Validate backend-decimal constraints for Forex application

steps.title: Ensure amount to buy has 2 decimals with min "0.01"
Ensure amount to sell has 2 decimals with min "0.01"
Ensure exchange rate has 4 decimals with min "0.0001"
Ensure contract amount has 2 decimals with min "0.01"

specs.title: Validate backend-additional business constraints for Forex application

steps.title: Ensure application number cannot start with space
Ensure conversion obligation checkbox is required
Ensure FX rate definition is required with valid default
Ensure form submits to correct endpoint with server validation
Ensure anti-forgery token is present for security

specs.title: Validate backend-action button declarations for Forex application

steps.title: Ensure action selector container exists with Knockout binding
Ensure Save Button exists in category
Ensure SaveAndNew action exists in category 1
Ensure Copy action exists in category 1
Ensure CopyWithLinks action exists in category 1
Ensure AssignComment action exists in category 1
Ensure SendToAuthorize action exists in category 1
Ensure Approve action exists in category 1
Ensure Authorize action exists in category 1
Ensure PDF actions exist in category 1
Ensure action buttons use Knockout data-bind pattern

specs.title: Validate documents tab and upload controls exist and table headers

steps.title: Ensure Documents tab is rendered by backend
Ensure Add Existing Document action exists
Ensure Create New Document action exists
Ensure document grid has required columns
Ensure empty state message displays when no documents
